overview: Bhanu Chandra, a forest officer by profession. Falls in love with a tribal girl "Tulasi". He gets arrested by Police as they mistakenly identify him as a Naxalite. In an unfortunate event, he kills a police man and gets life imprisonment. After Bhanu is released from jail, he hopes that Archana still waits for him despite all the years left behind them.
title: Nireekshana
